original_text: You are to slaughter the young bull before the Lord, and then Aaron’s sons the priests shall bring the blood and splash it against the sides of the altar at the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그는 여호와 앞에서 그 수송아지를 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손 제사장들은 그 피를 가져다가 회막 문 앞 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: You are to slaughter the young bull
and then Aaron's sons the priests
and splash it against the sides of the altar
at the entrance to the tent of meeting
